job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongSoftware EngineernbspnbspnbspnbspstrongppbrppLocation Saint Louis USAppbrppstrongJob DescriptionstrongppPierianDx a leader in the clinical genomics space is currently seeking talented and motivated software engineers As a Software Engineer your duties will primarily revolve around building software by writing good quality code as well as modifying software to fix errors adapt it to new scenarios  requirements improve its performance or upgrade interfaces You will also be involved in directing system testing and validation procedures and also working with the customer success department on technical issues including software system design and maintenancenbspTo be successful in this role you will need extensive knowledge of programming languages problem solving skills knowledge of best practices and the software development lifecycleppbrppstrongAbout PierianDxstrongppEvery year millions of people bet their lives on precision medicine PierianDx is on a mission to make sure that bet pays off At PierianDx we empower progressive health institutions and diagnostic laboratories to build worldclass precision medicine programs Our industryleading molecular genomics technologies and expertise deliver the most integrated trusted and collaborative approach across the clinical care spectrum From genomic sequencing and biomedical informatics in the laboratory to reporting and decision support at the patients bedside we drive the adoption of genomics in clinical care and accelerate the fight against cancer and other diseases For more information visit wwwpieriandxcomppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesnbspstrongpulliWork with product teams to understand product requirements  user needs ask relevant questions to get clarity on how the end user is going to use the system and understand acceptance criterialiliTake ownership of developing endtoend product featuresepicsuser storiesnbspliliContribute in design activities and documentation Getting design reviewed by technical leads  architects provide estimates for stories in the scopeliliDevelop good quality code using published best practicesnbspliliWork as part of team to achieve sprint and release goalsliliParticipate in daily scrum to provide a plan for upcoming tasks and ask for help for any roadblocks Keep the JIRA board updatedliliWork with Leads in creating documentation deliverables at each stagenbspliliShare knowledge with fellow teammates to improve their knowledge or skillsliliHelp customer success teams on technical issues including software system design and maintenanceliliEnsure compliance with SDLC processes defined at organization level to meet quality goals set at product levelliliStay uptodate on product and process trainings required to create quality deliverables at each phase of product lifecycleliulpnbspppstrongRequired Skills and ExperiencenbspstrongpulliMust have experience with Node JS React Javascript MongoDB Basic Linux and Basic Shell ScriptingnbspliliShould be an outstanding programmer with minimum 2 years of experience in MERN MongoDB Express React Node JS technology stackliliStrong computer science fundamentals OO programming algorithms data structures databasesnbspliliExperience with continuous integration infrastructure for software development such as JenkinsnbspliliExperience with the structure and usage of DatabasesnbspliliExperience with DockerliliTotal years of experience 2 to 5 yearsliulpbrppstrongPreferred ExperiencestrongpulliKnowledge of JavaScript Frameworks Angular Vue Elastic Search Life or Master of Science degree in Computer Science or equivalent from a reputed collegenbspppbrppstrongPierianDx is an Equal Opportunity EmployerstrongppPierianDx is a proud to be an equal opportunity disability medical condition sexual orientation pregnancy military or veteran status citizenship status and genetic informationppnbspppstrongWork VerificationstrongppPierianDx verifies all employees for the right to work within the United States To do this we participate in the Everify program This means that we provide the Social Security Administration SSA and if necessary the Department of Homeland Security DHS with information from each new employees Form I9 to confirm work authorizationp
